attributes.action: Remove Ecuador from the red travel list immediately or change hotel quarantine
attributes.additional_details: I would like Ecuador to come out of the red travel list since there doesn’t seem to be a massive covid infection. There is a lot of people who are getting stressed and having a lot emotional meltdowns because of missing their relatives. My mom is one of those persons who is been affected very badly emotionally because of her missing her grand daughter. So I won’t like anyone to go through it..
attributes.background: To remove Ecuador from the red travel list or change the quarantine hotel for a quarantine at home which will allowed to safe some money for family that wanted to visit their relatives that couldn’t see for long time

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/597785
